channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- Bosch Recording Station

item.title: CVE-2020-6774|2024-08-04T09:11:04.728Z -- bosch -- bosch%20recording%20station
item.description: Improper Access Control in the Kiosk Mode functionality of Bosch Recording Station allows a local unauthenticated attacker to escape from the Kiosk Mode and access the underlying operating system.
